None.Name: Gifted Ice Breaker
None.Description: Building is surrounded by an icy aura with a 25m radius that enables all friendly entities within it to deal 125% of their usual damage against frozen units. Additionally, every enemy within this aura will be slowed down and only be able to move at walk speed.
